author: Megan Armstrong
title: Chinese Basketball Association Reportedly Postpones Season Until at Least July
description: The Chinese Basketball Association will not resume its season until at least July after league officials met overnight Monday "to discuss the fate of its season" amid the COVID-19 pandemic, according to ESPN's  Jonathan Givony ...
content:
Todd Kirkland/Getty Images
The Chinese Basketball Association will not resume its season until at least July after league officials met overnight Monday "to discuss the fate of its season" amid the COVID-19 pandemic, according to ESPN's Jonathan Givony.
